title: Bug 114903 Default values are not shown in Show Report Parameters' dialog
OB: When accessing the Show Report Parameters' dialog, the default values for the parameters are not displayed.
EB: I expect that when I click on the Show Report Parameters button and open the Enter Parameters dialog, the default values for the parameters should be shown in their respective value boxes.
SR:
To reproduce this issue: 
1. Preview the report. 
2. Click on the Show Report Parameters button. 
3. Observe that the Enter Parameters dialog opens with all the values empty, even though there are default values set for the parameters.
